item.title: Furry Writing, Storytime, and Worldbuilding
item.description: /c/Furry Writing, Storytime, and Worldbuilding on pawb.social [home] [/c/furrywriting ðŸŒŽ] [pawb.social] Description This is the place to share and discuss stories related to the Furry Fandom. Whether a story about your real experiences in the fandom, or a fictional story themed around anthrophomorphic animals. We also encourage discussions about worldbuilding related to anthrophomorphic animals. For rules, please follow pawb.social site-wide code of conducts. Details Activity Count Subscribers 26 Posts 1 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 1 Monthly Active Users 1 Activity Date Published 2023-06-12 00:16:35 Updated 2023-06-15 22:03:20 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:59

item.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
item.description: /c/Sonic the Hedgehog on pawb.social [home] [/c/sonic ðŸŒŽ] [pawb.social] Description Welcome to the Sonic ~~Zone~~ Community hosted on pawb.social! If you're joining from another Lemmy Instance, search for [!sonic@pawb.social](https://pawb.social/c/sonic) Come in and discuss the radical blue blur that was a gateway to the furry fandom for some of you! Details Activity Count Subscribers 14 Posts 2 Comments 2 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 2 Monthly Active Users 2 Activity Date Published 2023-06-14 03:29:40 Updated 2023-06-14 03:35:43 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:59

item.title: transfurs
item.description: /c/transfurs on pawb.social [home] [/c/transfurs ðŸŒŽ] [pawb.social] Description This is a place for transgender furries to come together and discuss more about the intersectionality between their furry and trans experiences. Of course, other queer furries and allies are welcome to join, but please keep things in topic! For rules, please follow pawb.social site-wide code of conducts. item.title: Safe drawings of cute boys!
item.description: /c/Safe drawings of cute boys! on pawb.social [home] [/c/boys ðŸŒŽ] [pawb.social] Description A safe for work community dedicated to posting art of cute boys! Any boys, human or furry, are okay! In addition to the [pawb.social COC](https://pawb.social/post/100): - Please try to post links to where the artwork was posted originally, and always credit the original artist - Don't repost art if the artist explicitly asks that you don't Details Activity Count Subscribers 26 Posts 9 Comments 4 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 5 Monthly Active Users 5 Activity Date Published 2023-06-12 07:19:17 Updated 2023-06-12 07:30:42 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:59

item.title: Furry
item.description: /c/Furry on pawb.social [home] [/c/furry ðŸŒŽ] [pawb.social] Description General community for furry stuff and memes! Please follow pawb.social rules, with addition of the following: 1. AI-generated content should be clearly marked in the title of the post, though it is generally discouraged unless it is in some way unique. If it becomes excessive still and drowns out artists or otherwise becomes an issue this may be further restricted. Details Activity Count Subscribers 382 Posts 32 Comments 218 Daily Active Users 33 Weekly Active Users 95 Monthly Active Users 100 Activity Date Published 2023-06-03 18:51:19 Updated 2023-06-15 18:21:44 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:59

item.title: AI Experiments
item.description: /c/AI Experiments on pawb.social [home] [/c/ai_experiments ðŸŒŽ] [pawb.social] Description A place to dump all the interesting and inhuman things done with AI and embrace the weirdness! It doesn't have to be beautiful, in fact it's even better when there's spaghetti floating in the air and the images make you want to crawl out of your skin. You can also post stuff related to LMs, games and anything else, it only has to be weird and novel in some way.
